short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 🌈 Transform Your New Tab Page with Minimal New Tab! 🌈

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the freedom of a clean, clutter-free New Tab page with Minimal New Tab! 🎨✨ This extension lets you create a custom solid color background that helps you stay calm, focused, and ready to take on the day. Perfect for those who value simplicity, minimalism, and the power of choice! 🧘‍♂️

✨ Customizable Color: Pick any color that matches your vibe or mood! Whether you need a calm blue to focus 🧘‍♀️ , a vibrant yellow to energize ⚡, or just match the color to your Chrome theme 🎨 , it’s all up to you!

🚫 Say Goodbye to Distractions: No more search bar, no more shortcuts, and no more unnecessary clutter. Enjoy a clean, and simple design that won’t compete for your attention.

💼 Enhanced Productivity: With a blank canvas, you can start fresh each time you open a new tab. Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone who values their focus time! 🎯

---

How to Use Minimal New Tab:

1. Open the Extension: Click the extension icon to bring up the options menu.
   
2. Pick Your Color: Choose from a full spectrum of colors using the color picker 🌈—or go even further and use the eyedropper tool to grab a color directly from anywhere on your screen! 🎯

3. Apply & Enjoy: Open a new tab, and voila! Your custom color fills the screen, providing a serene backdrop for whatever you need to focus on.

4. Reset Anytime: Want to switch it up? Simply pick a new color or use the reset button to start fresh. It’s as easy as one click! 🖱️✨

---

Imagine a New Tab Page That’s…

- Designed Just for You: Perfectly customized to your taste, no matter your mood.
- Free of Distractions: Let your new tab page be a breath of fresh air every time you open it.
- Effortlessly Functional: No need to dig into settings—everything is right there in the extension popup!

🧘‍♂️ Try Minimal New Tab now for a better browsing experience!
